name: Hack the North - 2019 Branding and Website
description:
In September of 2019, we welcomed 1,500+ hackers to the University of Waterloo.


This file was originally used by the Hack the North design team to create our 2019 Design System and Website.


While these assets are copyright Hack the North, we welcome people to use these source files to learn the techniques behind how we made them.


See the 2019 site in action at: https://2019.hackthenorth.com/ and view the open-source code at: https://github.com/hackthenorth/hackthenorth.com


Learn more about Hack the North:
